candidates.name: Janie Annear
candidates.why_elect: I am highly experienced in Local Govt. 9 years as your Mayor and 5 years as a local Govt. Commissioner working with councils all around N.Z with efficiency and effectiveness, representation, boundary changes and amalgamations. I'm am also an experienced Director in the public private sector. I offer stable, strong, inclusive, dynamic, caring proven leadership.
candidates.why_stand: I believe in our District, it's people and its future. I am restanding as your Mayor because I believe we are not living up to our potential as a District. We must be more strategic and focused in our planning, economic development and promotion, delivery of services and enhancement of our environment.

candidates.name: Kari (AJ) Mohoao
candidates.why_elect: I was born and bred in this region. Geraldine, Pleasant Point, Arowhenua, Temuka and Timaru have been home to me and I will represent them all. A natural and experienced leader with a hands on approach with common sense and straight talking. My loyalty will be to the people.
candidates.why_stand: I made my decision to stand for Mayor after what I would consider ongoing lapses in judgement by the current council. I feel they have acted without truly listening to the people or recognising upcoming challenges that we are facing, focusing too heavily on industry instead of people.

candidates.name: Shane Wilson
candidates.why_elect: I bring a new perspective to the table, being younger and being "an everyman."
candidates.why_stand: To bring a larger youth voice/direction to the district.
